faq.title: Should I learn business basics?
content: You don’t need an MBA in business to be successful, but you should be aware of how a business operates. There is one common thing for all jobs in every domain — you need to learn business basics to understand how things work, how to deploy ideas, and fine-tune a working flow.

faq.title: How do I learn business basics?
content: Whether you want to build a remarkable career or run your own business, you should start with learning basic ideas of business. To learn business basics, you can choose from several options — go to business school, watch online business courses, get real-life experience working in a company, or find a mentor and become an apprentice. The first thing to remember, you can’t just learn how to do business — the secret ingredient is to actually take action.
